_description: St. John and the Boy, a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
Sant Ion the euangelyst dydTyll a ȝong man þat he luf
                    kyd…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…To þis tempyll ihesu vs bryng& graunt vs all gud
                    endyng
BodSelSup52.Note: With ten extra lines at the beginning.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
When halikirk beganne newlySaynte Ione was full
                    bisy…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…In þat tempiles ihesu kyngeffor his mercye he þidir
                    vs bringe . Amen .

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Whon holi chirche bi gon newelySeint Ion was euere ful
                    bisy…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In þat Temple is Ihesu kyngffor his Merci he þidere
                    vs bring. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Hou a bisschop myskepte seynt Iones child (f. 175va)

Doyle,  I. A.,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Qwen holy kyrke be gan newlySaint Iohn was traweland &
                    besy…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…In þat temple es ieshu kyngeffor his mercy þithir
                    he vs brynge

BLHar2391.First Lines: When holy kyrk be gan nwlySayn Iohn was full besy…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …In þe tempull es Ihesu kyngffor hys mercy he ȝedir vs bryng
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica i post epiphaniam (left margin, f. 164), plus “A tale” written above this

EDCPCM.First Lines:
quen hali kirc bigan newliSain Ion was sisel and
                    bisi…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…In þat tempil es iesus kingFor his merci he þider
                    us bring

MinULZ822.First Lines:
When haly kyrke be gane newlySaynt ion was traual wide &
                    besy…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…In þat temple ys ihesu kyngefor hys mercy he þidere
                    vs brynge

HunHM129.First Lines:
When holy cyrk be gan newlySeint Ion wos gerne and
                    besy…
HunHM129.Last Lines:

                    vs brynge
